Package org.sercho.masp.space

Contains basic space types.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
EqualityChecker<T> EqualityChecker compares objects of type T for equality.
ObjectMatcher ObjectMatcher is able to compare two objects and determine whether they "match".
ObjectUpdater ObjectUpdater updates objects based on a prototype object.
SpaceProvider<E extends TupleSpace<?>> SpaceProvider manages some TupleSpaces and gives access to them.
TupleSpace<T> TupleSpace defines a basic tuple space.
 

Class Summary
ReflectiveObjectMatcher ReflectiveObjectMatcher compares object per Java reflection.
ReflectiveObjectUpdater ReflectiveObjectUpdater
SecureSpaceWrapper<T> SecureSpaceWrapper adds access control functionality to a given EventedTupleSpace.
SimpleObjectSpace<T> SimpleObjectSpace provides a basic implementation of a tuple space.
 

Package org.sercho.masp.space Description

Contains basic space types.
